channel.title: 🏢 Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Old Dominion University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Department of Mathematics and Statistics, Old Dominion University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Addressing Spectral Bias of Deep Neural Networks by Multi-Grade Deep Learning
item.description: Multi-Grade Deep Learning (MGDL) conquers spectral bias in deep neural networks by incrementally learning low-frequency components, ultimately capturing high-frequency features through composition.
